node.html:
• Migrated Transship Info Management Services to NAWS using Lambda, API Gateway, Amazon SNS, Route 53 DNS and DynamoDB, reduced 30% operating cost than previous infrastructure.
  • Developed a comprehensive design document outlining the process and plan for system migration, including deployment strategies and contingency measures.
  • Created pipeline workflow from alpha stage to production stage with different global regions.
  • Set up API gateways, create testing framework for system operating status on Cloudwatch

• Implement SSO feature for an internal DevOps tools website, providing secure access for over 1000+ users.
  • Backend: Constructed user authentication service using Python Flask framework and Azure AD.
  • Frontend: Created new user login interface using ADP OneUX UI and Angular framework.
  • Designed the project workflow and coordinated with 10+ engineers from different teams to ensure timely delivery and seamless integration of the new system.

• Provided technical support to the company, resolving issues related to computer hardware and software.
  • Conducted data collection and analysis assignments using Python and Excel for monthly patient status lists.
  • Reviewed diagnostics and assessed the functionality and efficiency of computer hardware and systems.

• Pioneered the conception and implementation of a mobile testing framework for Evist, guiding the entire process from inception through deployment. Employed a skill set comprising Appium, Python, Xcode, and Jenkins.
  • Applied SQL in conjunction with Oracle Developer and SAS to perform extensive analysis on the Patient Health Information Database.
  • Leveraged UIPath to create automation scripts tailored for Epic Hyperspace, resulting in an 80% reduction in manual data entry and marked enhancement in operational efficiency.
